features: Original Reinforced Stitching - Often imitated but never duplicated! Since 2014 our proven design promotes over packing and layered with a breathable mesh. Your Shacke Pak stays sturdy even when you pack more. It was constructed to fit snugly in your luggage and stay ready for you at your final destination.
The Quintessential Packing Starter Kit – Each bag size in this set was tested, designed, and selected to create the perfect packing cube kit for up to a 10 to 14 day vacation.

Perfect for Any Type of Trip - Whether you travel by car, train, or plane, your Shacke Pak can make life on the road much easier! Our customers enjoy using their cubes for day trips or even a big romantic getaway in Paris. No trip is too big or too small for the versatility of our packing cubes.

Easy Clean Material – Watch liquids glide smoothly off your packing cubes making it easy for cleaning. Accompanied by smooth snag free ergonomic zipper pulls, pack your way through any travel adventures while resting assure your packing cubes are made from the best material.

The Shacke Pak Difference – For over 8 years we have been trusted by thousands of customers worldwide to help with their packing needs. We have always lead with the philosophy of making travel products to maximize your adventures. Join the thousands of customers and experience the Shacke difference for yourself.
body.description: Pack More Clothes in a Small Space For Your Next TripOne of the toughest things to do while packing for a trip is fitting everything you want to bring with you into your luggage. Our packing cube system fixes that issue by neatly packing all your clothes tightly into our space saving bags. It allows you to easily store and organize your clothing that makes it easy to pack and even easier to unpack. Your clothes will stay more wrinkled free and not get crushed during your travels. Shacke Pak is made with a high quality durable water resistant nylon material built to withstand the wear and tears of travel. It is reinforced with a X-Design web stitching made specifically to prevent the fabric from folding in the middle, allowing for a more secure packing experience. Our bags are 4 inch deep giving you enough space to pack more clothing. Finally, we use high quality zippers for a smooth and sturdy use. Shacke Pak Overview:-5 Packing Cubes - 4 x Medium (13.75x9.75x4) 1 x Small (11" x 6.75" x 4")How to care for your packing cubes: - Hand washing cubes is the best way to ensure the cubes do not get damaged - Wash only with cold water - Hang dry only - DO NOT put the cubes in the washing machine, even if it is on gentle or delicate cycle - DO NOT put fabric conditioner of any kind

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Organize Like the Pros Wouldn’t it be great to organize your clothes neatly in your suitcase and then close your luggage without sitting on it first? If you’re nodding your head in agreement, you’ll love how our Shacke Pak will change your packing game. Feather Light Packing Made with light weight and sturdy materials, the Shacke Pak achieves the perfect weight-quality balance for efficient packing and organization. We’ve done all the testing and research and constructed the perfect set so you can just focus on your trip. Pack More in Less Space Unleash the added space saving benefits from your packing cubes. Your clothes will stay wrinkled free and our Original X-Design Pattern will ensure it will all hold together waiting for you at your destination Designed by USA Travelers After trying countless packing cubes that we’re either the wrong size or poor quality, we set out to create the Original X-Design Reinforcement Shacke Pak packing cube, one that not only helps you organize your packing, but also made from reliable material.

We Never Compromise on Quality This is no ordinary packing case. Each element is thoughtfully designed to ensure maximum longevity and convenience. The exterior is made from Premium Water-Resistant material and equipped with a double stitched top panel. Equipped with a trusty snag free zipper. It's designed to withstand years of use without showing a hint of wearing down. Breathable Double Stitched Top Mesh Panel The tough mesh material allows your clothing to breath and gives you easy visibility to identify what’s inside your packing cube. It is backed by double stitching for added protection against over packing and designed to withstand years of use without showing a hint of wearing down. Water-Resistant for Easy Cleaning After a long trip, your clothes are not the only thing that will need to be clean and nobody likes a dirty packing cube. Our special water resistant coating makes cleaning a breeze. With a little soap and water your stains will fade away with ease and your cubes will be ready for you for your next adventure. Snag Free Zipper with Pull Cord Dealing with a snagged zipper is never fun, not to mention the damage it can do to your bag’s fabric. We have zipped, pulled, open and closed a variety of zippers and have handpicked the perfect zippers to accompany our packing cubes. Also the added cord pull makes opening and closing the cubes a breeze.

Are you ready for an adventure? Pack More Clothes in a Small Space For Your Next Trip Each bag size in this set was tested, designed, and selected to create the perfect packing cube kit for up to a 10 to 14 day vacation. Sized to Perfection - 4 pcs - Medium (13.75" x 9.75" x 4") - 1 pcs - Small (11" x 6.75" x 4")

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED - May 13 2017 - Shacke Pak the Real Deal - Great Quality for the Price
reviews.reviewText: POST-TRIP UPDATE - May 13, 2017We just got back from using these cubes on a 14 day trip to Italy. We easily stand by the 5 star rating. Great product and it really helped in our organization of the clothing and accessories. I look forward to using them on any trip. Smart way to travel and does not add much weight but really keeps thing neat and organized when you open your bag when you get to your destination.Outstanding value for the quality of this packing cube set. I got the four and one set (4 medium and 1 small). They are perfectly sized for my trip. The quality is better than we expected. We have three other brands of packing cube sets; this one wins. We have an Eagle Creek set (ne small bag, one medium, and one folder thing), and the other two cube sets have no official brand name since we bought them on Ebay. One of them from Ebay is useable but wimpy and says "Is My Dress too much?" on one side. The other packing cube set from Ebay is really excellent quality also for the money we paid; just a different fabric, and no YKK zips but not a big deal. This second Ebay set is the exact same as this one on Amazon, which gets very good ratings (https://www.amazon.com/BAGSMART-Breathable-Travel-Packing-Cubes/dp/B00QTFRL70/ref=sr_1_33?ie=UTF8&qid=1490045267&sr=8-33&keywords=packing+cubes). In conclusion though the fabric on the Shacke Pak is nicer and so I think the Shacke Paks are just better made. YKK zippers slide nicely and are strong. Good stitching and the handle is a little nicer than the Eagle Creek, slightly so. But Eagle Creek is way too much ($40) for the very small differences. The Shacke Pak is made as good as the Eagle Creek. Both come with a lifetime warranty. I think that is kind of funny though - a "lifetime warranty" on a packing cube! Good luck to us all on that one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A TRAVEL MUST HAVE
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased several sets of these packing cubes. We went on our first travel adventure of the year and used them to pack. I have 2 colors, so they are color coded. One color for the hubby and another for me. They worked great! The hubby wasn't rummaging through everything to find something to wear and I knew what he was wearing would not clash:-) I always pack everything, so I simply put an outfit in each cube. Rolled everything up and everything fit nicely. We have a longer trip coming up, so I'll be ordering a few more sets. I would recommend these for anyone that wants to stay organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth zippers, strong construction, light weight
reviews.reviewText: I'm enjoying loading these for my first trip with them. They seem to be well made, are easy to zip, have their contents visible, and are light. The size is good for clothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste too much time trying to decide (BUY IT!)
reviews.reviewText: It would be embarrassing to admit how much time I spent both debating buying something like this and choosing the right one.I don’t know if this is the perfect set, but it made my last trip infinitely better.It helped most in STAYING organized. I start out that way but it is never long before I start trying to find something and end up making a mess of my organizationIt was easier to pack, especially because I bought an OCD type folding tool that made all the clothes fit perfectly. I think it’s called flipfold.I will be using this every time I travel from now on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Wish I had known about this long ago.
reviews.reviewText: Perfectly sized to fit clothes and misc items for easy packing into a suitcase. No more digging everything out looking for what you need, and then trying to fit it all back in. The bags keep everything together, and dealing with suitcase living for a trip is a lot easier with these bags. Excellent product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done, made traveling less of a headache
reviews.reviewText: Even though I travel quite often for work and pleasure, I had never used packing cubes. Decided to purchase for use during a week long cruise after a friend raved about using them. After comparing other brands and styles and reading reviews, I settled on these. Generally speaking, packing cubes are a great investment. This pack in particular I think was a pretty good value for the price. The pack I ordered came with 4 medium cubes and 1 small one for about $26. The medium cubes stacked nicely in my mid-size rolling suitcase and helped to keep me organized during the trip. I packed my cubes according to apparel type - all my tees/tanks/tops in one, pants/shorts in another, dresses were in a third, bathing suits and beach cover ups in the fourth. Another option would be to pack the cubes in outfits, just depends on your style/needs. They definitely hold much more than you would expect - for example 1 medium cube held 3 pairs of women's bermuda-style khaki shorts, 2 pairs of jeans, 2 pairs of pants, a pair of leggings, and a sweater. I used the smallest cube for all my undergarments but that could have also been used for misc accessories, electronics cords, toiletries, etc. The only things I packed "loose" in my suitcase were shoes and some random items that were too big for my makeup/toiletries case.Pros for this specific make and model of packing cubes - affordable, lightweight, breathable mesh panels, sized just right. Cons - need handles on both long and short ends (just on long side on these) and mesh panels on sides so you can see what is inside regardless of how you choose to stack them. Also would prefer a cube with a little more structure/firmer bottom or sides for easier packing. Overall I would definitely recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for RV organizing!!
reviews.reviewText: Love the different sizes. Easy to use and takes very little space to store. Works great in RV’s!!!

reviews.reviewText: Great idea for packing. Absolutely love these.
Buen tamaño, adaptable a diferentes maletas, de buena calidad, se ven resistentes
Aunque parezcan pequeñas tienen buen tamaño, te ayudan a organizar mejor la maleta
Great product for travelers, easy to organize and easy to use. Love them.

Love the pink, a blue pack for my other half. I knew he would wish for his own when he saw mine. These we are using for our Cunard Cruise. It’s hard work packing. These cubes are nice and firm and I appreciate the mesh for ventilation and ability to seewhat is inside. Thank you Shacke Pak.
